casebody.data:
The People of the State of Illinois, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Richard Wallace, Defendant-Appellant.(No. 72-89;Second DistrictJanuary 12, 1973.Charles S. Wilson III, of Waukegan, for appellant.Jack Hoogasian, State’s Attorney, of Waukegan, (James W. Jerz, of counsel,) for the People.

Opinion by Mr. JUSTICE SEIDENFELD.
